类 SmartSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

                • UserInterface.SmartSquare
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, TimeChecker

    public class SmartSquare
extends GameSquare
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, TimeChecker
    This class inherits from the GameSquare class. This class implements the methods from ActionListener and MouseListener to respond different click events. Each square has its own unique representation of coordinates and attributes. This class counts the number of its surrounding bombs once user clicks the square. This class shows a pop-up window when the game failed or user succeed.
    从以下版本开始:
    3/21/2019 8:41 PM
    作者:
    Hephaest

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SmartSquare

        public SmartSquare(int x,
                   int y,
                   GameBoard board)
        Create a new SmartSquare instance, which can be placed on a GameBoard.
        参数:
        x - the x co-ordinate of this square on the game board.
        y - the y co-ordinate of this square on the game board.
        board - the GameBoard upon which this square resides.

    • 方法详细资料

      • clicked

        public void clicked()
        An implementation method of abstract method (from GameSquare). Once get click event, detect bombs and expand into empty space.
        指定者:
        clicked 在类中 GameSquare
